meanings.definition: A person who adheres strictly to a set of rules or principles.
meanings.sent1: The rigorist always follows the school rules without fail.
meanings.sent2: The teacher praised the student for being a dedicated rigorist in following the guidelines.
meanings.sent3: The rigorist made sure to double-check every rule before proceeding.
meanings.sent4: She was a rigorist in her approach to time management, never deviating from her schedule.
meanings.sent5: The rigorist's commitment to the principles was unwavering and admirable.

meanings.definition: Characterized by strict adherence to rules or principles.
meanings.sent1: The rigorist approach to safety protocols ensured a secure environment.
meanings.sent2: His rigorist attitude towards honesty earned him the trust of his peers.
meanings.sent3: The rigorist cat insisted on having its meals at the exact same time every day.
meanings.sent4: The rigorist mountain stood tall, unmoved by the changing weather.
meanings.sent5: The rigorist routine of the factory kept everything running smoothly.
